Package bt.net

Class MessageDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.net.MessageDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageDispatcher

    public class MessageDispatcher
extends Object
implements IMessageDispatcher
    Default single-threaded message dispatcher implementation.

    Note that this class implements a service. Hence, is not a part of the public API and is a subject to change.

      Add a message consumer to receive messages from a remote peer for a given torrent.
      void addMessageSupplier​(TorrentId torrentId, Peer recipient, Supplier<Message> messageSupplier)
      Add a message supplier to send messages to a remote peer for a given torrent.

        Add a message consumer to receive messages from a remote peer for a given torrent.

        torrentId - Torrent ID
        sender - Remote peer, whose messages should be relayed to the consumer

        torrentId - Torrent ID
        recipient - Remote peer, to whom the supplied messages should be sent
